GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19.118 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
Drivers: hv: vmbus: Fix potential crash on module unload

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 6b4c0149a56147b29169e07000d566162892722a, it was introduced in version v4.19.118 by commit 5e059fc0f054309036d3f612bc8b0a502ca58545. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Drivers: hv: vmbus: Fix potential crash on module unload
